name: beat-bubble-vr
description: Immersive 3D spherical beat mixer game. Place beats on a spinning sphere inside a VR-ready environment. Features Web Audio API synthesis for kick, snare, hi-hat, bass, and synth sounds. Perfect for music creation and relaxation.
author: Hermetic Labs
features: 5 sound types (Kick, Snare, Hi-Hat, Bass, Synth)

card.title: Beat Bubble VR
card.description: Immersive 3D spherical beat mixer with Web Audio synthesis

summary.overview: VR-ready 3D beat mixer where you place beats on a spinning sphere. Features Web Audio API synthesis for kick, snare, hi-hat, bass, and synth - no external audio files needed.
summary.exampleUseCase: Click to place beats on 5 track lanes, adjust tempo from 60-180 BPM, drag to look around the sphere, and watch visual pulses sync with your rhythm creation.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Pure Web Audio synthesis means zero loading time and works offline. The spherical interface is intuitive for VR but works great with mouse/touch. Perfect for creative breaks or focus sessions.
